actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill to amend title 11 of the United States Code to make nondischargeable debts for liabilities under the terms of a property settlement agreement entered into in connection with a separation agreement or divorce decree.

summary.text: Amends Federal bankruptcy law to provide that the discharge of a debtor's debts does not discharge him or her from any debt or for any liability under the terms of a property settlement entered into in connection with a separation agreement or divorce decree.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 11 of the United States Code to make nondischargeable debts for liabilities under the terms of a property settlement agreement entered into in connection with a separation agreement or divorce decree.
